column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We visited tonight for the first time! It certainly lives up to the hype! The food was so tasty and the service was phenomenal! Our server
column3: was great-he was attentive and knowledgeable (his knowledge of the menu was very impressive and helpful)! The manager
column5: also checked in with us! She was very kind and made sure everything was perfect! We had several dishes and they all tasted great! I had their seasonal sangria (mango) and it was amazing! The price was also right! It was a great dinner all around!
